metadata.synopsis: This is the totem about human size with the base of pyramid build from skulls and the top of 3 skulls built inside the circle

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Ketheric Thorm dishonoured the very bones of his ancestors to make this totem to Myrkul.*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *Ketheric Thorm's ancestors, desecrated and arranged into foul artworks. But why?*

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *Reclaimed bones, turned into strange effigies. Their meaning is lost on you.*
